Articles.Content: I'm Robbie from Dublin. I was an avid flight simmer . A new baby put an end to that a couple of months back . I've been playing kerbal around 2 months now grabbing an hour here & there. Lovely game .Actually I think it's definitely more than a game . It's like a little science experience. Love it. Anyway just thought I'd drop a line to say hello .

Welcome to the forums!

Glad to hear you've been enjoying the game. You're certainly not the first to find KSP to be "more than a game"; you'll probably run into a lot of people around here for whom their introduction to the game turned out to be a life-changing experience. I know some of our younger members have been encouraged to try to go into the aerospace industry or astronomy themselves in their enthusiasm.

At any rate, make yourself comfortable!

Congrats on becoming a father, I can attest to it being one of life's greatest experiences. (Don't worry about the sleep deprivation, it gets better after a few years.)

Welcome aboard, I'm sure you'll enjoy your time here.
